test_description: This test covers fundamental concepts of operating systems including structure, operations, services, system calls, and boot processes.

questions.question: What is the primary function of an operating system?
questions.options_a: To manage hardware and software resources

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an operating system service?
questions.options_a: Program execution

questions.question: What is a system call in an operating system?
questions.options_a: A program that manages hardware resources
questions.options_b: A request from a program to the OS for a service

questions.question: Which type of system call is used to create a new process?
questions.options_a: fork()

questions.question: What is the purpose of system programs?
questions.options_a: To provide a convenient environment for program development and execution
questions.options_c: To replace the need for an operating system

questions.question: Which operating system structure is known as the 'onion model'?
questions.options_a: Monolithic

questions.question: What happens during system boot?
questions.options_a: The OS is loaded into memory and initialized

questions.question: Which component is responsible for loading the operating system into memory during boot?
questions.options_a: BIOS

questions.question: What is the main advantage of a microkernel architecture?
questions.options_a: Better security and stability

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a type of user interface provided by operating systems?
questions.options_a: Command-Line Interface (CLI)

questions.question: What is the purpose of device drivers in an operating system?
questions.options_a: To provide interfaces to specific hardware devices

questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of monolithic operating system architecture?
questions.options_a: All OS functionality is in kernel space

questions.question: What is the role of the shell in an operating system?
questions.options_a: It provides the user interface to the OS

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common operating system function?
questions.options_a: Memory management

questions.question: What is the purpose of system utilities?
questions.options_a: To perform maintenance and administrative tasks

questions.question: Which of the following best describes an operating system?
questions.options_a: A program that acts as an intermediary between users and hardware

questions.question: What is the first program that runs when a computer boots up?
questions.options_a: Bootstrap loader

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common type of system call?
questions.options_a: Process control

questions.question: What is the main purpose of the kernel in an operating system?
questions.options_a: To manage system resources and provide core services

questions.question: Which of the following best describes the role of an operating system in memory management?
questions.options_a: Allocating and deallocating memory space as needed
